messages: No one can make me cry, make me laugh, make me smile or drive me mad like he does.. --
No one can make me cry, make me laugh, make me smile or drive me mad like he does.. --
"Don't know what I did to earn a love like this, but baby I must be doin' somethin' right" ✨
